argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | madetsumid.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | madetsumid.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | madetsumid.u | |- U = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` U ) |
| 6 | 3 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( R e. CRing -> U e. CMnd ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> U e. CMnd ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( M e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> M e. B ) |
| 12 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( M e. B -> M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 12, 13 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) /\ r e. N ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) /\ r e. N ) -> r e. N ) |
| 17 | 15, 16, 16 | #P_fovrnd | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) /\ r e. N ) -> ( r M r ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> A. r e. N ( r M r ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 7, 10, 18 | #P_gsummptcl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( U gsum ( r e. N |-> ( r M r ) ) ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
